text: Berlevåg () is a municipality in Finnmark county, Norway. The population is 885 (2024's fourth quarter), according to the mayor.https://www.vg.no/nyheter/i/4Bx6MV/jonas-gahr-stoere-faar-frp-refs-i- kriseland-han-har-blitt-et-symbol-paa-det-som-har-skjaert-seg.
